plot: A cross-cultural collaboration between Canadian poet-filmmaker Steven McCabe and Iranian painter Shirin Pilehvari. The film juxtaposes McCabe's poetry with Pilehvari's paintings within the imagery of the Niagara Escarpment.
title: Flightpath
plot_es: A cross-cultural collaboration between Canadian poet-filmmaker Steven McCabe and Iranian painter Shirin Pilehvari. The film juxtaposes McCabe's poetry with Pilehvari's paintings within the imagery of the Niagara Escarpment.
plot_en: A cross-cultural collaboration between Canadian poet-filmmaker Steven McCabe and Iranian painter Shirin Pilehvari. The film juxtaposes McCabe's poetry with Pilehvari's paintings within the imagery of the Niagara Escarpment.
